text:
@realDonaldTrump @leezeldin Meanwhile, @GovAbbott has taken a page out of the @realDonaldTrump playbook...blame others for your failures. Yo @GregAbbott_TX, leaders lead while weaklings blame others for their failures and incompetence. #WeakPresident #WeakGovernor #TwoWeakAssMofos
https://t.co/dZfZfT4F5o
